rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A spacious entrance that aligns with Vastu principles for welcoming positive energy, featuring traditional Kerala-style motifs.
rooms.vastu_notes: Orientation facing north to south, ensuring smooth flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A central living area designed for family gatherings with natural light and ventilation. Traditional Kerala woodwork incorporated.
rooms.vastu_notes: North or east facing to promote positivity.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, designed for family dining with ample seating and natural lighting. Traditional stone accents used.
rooms.vastu_notes: Placed adjacent to the kitchen for energy balance.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Traditional Kerala-style kitchen with open layout, incorporating Vastu principles by ensuring the main entrance is accessible from a north or east facing direction.
rooms.vastu_notes: Avoid water elements; ensure proper drainage and ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, designed for privacy. Decorative elements follow Kerala aesthetics.
rooms.vastu_notes: North or east facing orientation recommended for restful energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A well-sized bedroom suitable for a child or guest, incorporating traditional design elements and ventilation.
rooms.vastu_notes: Optimized with natural light, preferably south facing.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom maintaining Kerala aesthetics; suitable for family or guest usage.
rooms.vastu_notes: Proper ventilation and east facing recommended.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Final bedroom ensuring balanced energy distribution, following traditional design principles.
rooms.vastu_notes: South or west orientation can be considered for balance.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Separate living and sleeping area for servants, ensuring privacy and efficiency. Maintains Vastu principles.
rooms.vastu_notes: Place adjacent to the kitchen with east facing window.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Large wooden door with intricate Kerala design, aligned with Vastu for energy flow.
openings.vastu_notes: Should face north or east to encourage positive energy entry.

openings.name: Front Porch
openings.description: Decorative porch space enhancing natural lighting and ventilation.
openings.vastu_notes: Ensure unobstructed pathway to the entrance.

openings.name: Balcony Windows
openings.description: Large windows offering ample daylight, designed to let in fresh air while maintaining privacy.
openings.vastu_notes: Prefer east for enhancing morning light and energy.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated space on the upper level for fitness, designed with modern equipment while incorporating traditional elements.
rooms.vastu_notes: Place in a north or east facing area to promote health and energy.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom on the first floor offering privacy, designed with Kerala aesthetics.
rooms.vastu_notes: Optimal if south or west oriented for balanced energy.

rooms.name: Additional Servant Quarters (Optional)
rooms.description: Additional space for servants on the upper floor if needed, ensuring privacy and convenience.
rooms.vastu_notes: East facing window recommended for positive energy.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: A central staircase connecting ground and first floor, designed in traditional Kerala style with appropriate lighting.
openings.vastu_notes: Ensure that the staircase is not in direct alignment with the main entrance.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: A landscaped area featuring a swimming pool, designed to offer relaxation and aesthetic appeal while respecting Vastu guidelines for water placement.
rooms.vastu_notes: Water elements should be placed in the north or northeast; ensure proper drainage and balance.

openings.name: Garden Entrance
openings.description: An entrance to the garden area from the main building, ensuring smooth transition into outdoor space.
openings.vastu_notes: Ensure clear pathway for energy flow.
